sentences.en: A hoard heaped by the roadside: plundered and passing on.

sentences.en: He kept a little hoard of chocolates in his top drawer.

sentences.en: His tone and look assured her he had not been the discoverer of the hoard.

sentences.en: Our hoard of calcium is relatively enormous - 2.2 pounds of it.

sentences.en: She lost all of her little hoard of money in one night.

sentences.en: Strategy: Before you make the break, start to hoard cash.
sentences.cn: 策略: 在您做出突破, 开始囤积现金.

trans.tran_en: a collection of things that someone hides somewhere, especially so they can use them later
to collect and save large amounts of food, money etc, especially when it is not necessary to do so
